abstract: Donors to Jeb Bush’s campaign are staying at a gay-friendly hotel where they will get yoga mats and brochures encouraging them to use Tesla electric cars.

headline.main: For Jeb Bush Donors, Yoga Mats and Tesla Brochures

snippet: Donors to Jeb Bush’s campaign are staying at a gay-friendly hotel where they will get yoga mats and brochures encouraging them to use Tesla electric cars.
